TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MetadataDispatcher extends Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.MetadataDispatcherBase
Public NotInheritable Class MetadataDispatcher Inherits MetadataDispatcherBase

Docs.summary: For handling the schema metadata API. Call one of the BuildMetadata methods to get a builder for a particular column. Wrap the return in a using statement. Disposing the builder records the metadata for the column. Call Seal() once all metadata is constructed.

Docs.summary: Start building metadata for a column that doesn't pass through any metadata from a source column.
